title: Leeds United v Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: The misfiring champions are set to face off against their rivals at Elland Road. Scott Murray is providing a minute-by-minute report on the match. Updates on the champions' performance will follow throughout the game.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week 11 – live
summary: Musicals Week features performances from The Greatest Showman and West Side Story, along with a new Dance Relay. Contestants aim to impress in the quarter-finals, as critics weigh in on their performances. Viewers are left wondering who will shine and who will underperform.

title: World Cup 2026 fixtures: England to kick off in Dallas in UK primetime
summary: England will start their World Cup campaign against Croatia on Wednesday, June 17, at 9 PM UK time. The match will take place in Dallas. This marks the beginning of England’s journey in the tournament.

title: National guard member wounded in DC attack is ‘slowly healing’, says West Virginia governor
summary: Andrew Wolfe was shot in the head on November 26, resulting in serious injury. Sarah Beckstrom succumbed to her injuries following the incident. The case is under investigation as authorities seek more information.

title: Zelenskyy to meet Starmer at Downing Street to discuss US draft peace deal
summary: Emmanuel Macron and Friedrich Merz are scheduled to participate in discussions focused on ensuring Ukraine's security after the war. The talks aim to address the strategic measures necessary for Ukraine's stability following the conflict. Their involvement highlights ongoing international efforts to support Ukraine in the aftermath of the war.
